name: Elemeno Health
headline: Just-in-time training and communication for frontline healthcare teams
description:
Healthcare is delivered by teams – nurses, doctors, and staff, specific to each hospital, clinic, and department. They want to do their best, but cannot keep up with constantly changing information. Burnout >50%. Unprecedented turnover. Growing medical errors (the #3 cause of death in the US). $100B+ in waste.

Elemeno Health is a UCSF and Y Combinator-backed B2B SaaS for healthcare facilities– “a playbook in your pocket,” customized to support frontline teams with bite-sized training and communication at their fingertips, accessible 24/7 on any device. Our efficacy is demonstrated in our published results, passionate clients, and consistent renewals. 20x ROI. 75% decrease in medical errors.

# Confidence. Competence. Compliance.
Elemeno is the first just-in-time microlearning solution built for workforce empowerment and frontline ops. Easily customize to the specific needs of your hospital and units, or clinical trial and sites. Streamline training, drive high reliability, and empower your staff with concise and actionable information, exactly where and when needed. For frontline teams, Elemeno is a game changer.
[Health Systems](http://elemenohealth.com/<https:/www.elemenohealth.com/solutions-healthcare>)
[Pharma & Trials](http://elemenohealth.com/<https:/www.elemenohealth.com/solutions-pharma>)
![Phone showing the Elemeno mobile website and how to set up the Belmont Rapid Infuser](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/25c8fc_2adb7f3d9cb144f59f0fc63ed5bca7d6~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_0,y_145,w_2032,h_1879/fill/w_743,h_687,al_c,q_90,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/home-phone-1a.png)
Modernize your training. Help your team learn faster and perform at the top of their game through easy-to-digest, bite-size formats like short videos, images, and quick, simple job aids.
## Microlearning for maximum impact.

## Real-time support, when time matters most.
Empower your frontline teams by giving them 24/7 access to essential information at their fingertips, like equipment setup, procedure guides, team communications and more. It’s the information your team needs, at the exact time and place they need it.

generated_description:
**Elemeno Health: A Quick Overview**

Elemeno Health is a company driven by a mission to provide just-in-time training and communication solutions specifically for frontline healthcare teams. Founded in 2016 and backed by notable investors like UCSF and Y Combinator (Batch S16), Elemeno Health is headquartered in Oakland, California. With a lean team of 25 employees, they are tackling the critical challenges in healthcare—high burnout rates, unprecedented turnover, and the alarming rise in medical errors, which stands as the third leading cause of death in the U.S., collectively contributing to over $100 billion in waste annually.

The core of Elemeno's offering is a B2B SaaS platform designed as a "playbook in your pocket." This platform provides customized, bite-sized training and essential communication tools that are accessible anytime and from any device. The goal is to help healthcare teams stay informed and competent in an environment where information continually evolves. The results speak volumes: they report a 20x return on investment and a striking 75% reduction in medical errors.

Elemeno Health specializes in responding to the unique demands of various healthcare settings—be it hospitals, clinics, or clinical trials. Their innovative microlearning approach focuses on delivering easy-to-digest formats like videos and quick guides, effectively empowering frontline staff with the knowledge they need at the moment of need.

Moreover, the impact of their methods is significant; Elemeno claims a 75% reduction in training implementation time and a similar decrease in orientation time for new staff. The testimonials from users support the platform's efficacy, with one emergency department nurse labeling Elemeno as her "911."

In summary, Elemeno Health is not just about technology—it's about leveraging that technology to enable healthcare teams to perform optimally, reduce errors, and enhance patient care. The need for real-time, relevant information in healthcare has never been more vital, and Elemeno Health is stepping up to meet that challenge.

For more information, visit [Elemeno Health's website](http://elemenohealth.com) or reach out to them directly at info@elemenohealth.com.
